name: Ensure SageMaker Notebooks Are Encrypted
body: In order to prevent data breaches, it is advised to encrypt SageMaker Notebook instances using a KMS Key.
remediationDescription:
1. Go to the SageMaker dashboard
2. Create a new instance
3. In the `Permissions and encryption` section, select Customer managed key from the Encryption key drop down and enter the desired KMS Key ARN
4. Complete the rest of the configuration
5. Copy the data from the existing notebook instance to the new one
6. Once the data is copied, you can remove the old notebook instance
